name: Teleport
description:
This mod allows you to teleport to any distance.

To study the mod, you must have 20 level and 4 free points.

The mod incude:
Teleport
Gold Teleport Token
One-time scroll of teleportation (Teleport Scroll)

For teleportation it is necessary to have a minimum of 2 teleporters builded, as well as the Gold Teleport Token or Lingering Essence in the teleporter's inventory.

Teleport Scroll teleport you to the nearest Teleport. After using the scroll disappears.

Creation of teleport, tokens and scrolls of teleportation is performed in the altar of Mitra 2 levels and higher.

----
